attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: "{'query': \"SELECT \\n    (SELECT SUM(SL_AM) \\n     FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ \\n     WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695' \\n     AND SL_DT BETWEEN '20240701' AND '20240930' \\n     AND BLL_MC_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%') as total_amount,\\n    \\n    (SELECT json_group_array(json_object(\\n        'date', SL_DT,\\n        'amount', SL_AM,\\n        'discount', BLL_SV_AM\\n    ))\\n    FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ \\n    WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695' \\n    AND SL_DT BETWEEN '20240701' AND '20240930'\\n    AND BLL_MC_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%') as daily_details,\\n    \\n    (SELECT json_object(\\n        'total_discount', SUM(BLL_SV_AM),\\n        'discount_limit', (SELECT MLIM_AM FROM WPD_T_SV_SNGL_PRP_INF WHERE SV_C = 'SP03608'),\\n        'remaining_limit', (\\n            SELECT MLIM_AM - COALESCE(SUM(BLL_SV_AM), 0)\\n            FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ\\n            WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695'\\n            AND SL_DT LIKE '202409%'\\n            AND BLL_SV_DC = 'SP03608'\\n        )\\n    )\\n    FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ\\n    WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695'\\n    AND SL_DT BETWEEN '20240701' AND '20240930'\\n    AND BLL_MC_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%') as discount_info,\\n    \\n    (SELECT json_group_array(EVN_BULT_TIT_NM)\\n     FROM WLP_T_EVN_INF\\n     WHERE EVN_BULT_TIT_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%'\\n     AND EVN_SDT <= '20240930'\\n     AND EVN_EDT >= '20240701') as related_events;\"}"
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
"Error: (sqlite3.OperationalError) no such column: MLIM_AM
[SQL: SELECT 
    (SELECT SUM(SL_AM) 
     FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ 
     WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695' 
     AND SL_DT BETWEEN '20240701' AND '20240930' 
     AND BLL_MC_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%') as total_amount,
    
    (SELECT json_group_array(json_object(
        'date', SL_DT,
        'amount', SL_AM,
        'discount', BLL_SV_AM
    ))
    FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ 
    WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695' 
    AND SL_DT BETWEEN '20240701' AND '20240930'
    AND BLL_MC_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%') as daily_details,
    
    (SELECT json_object(
        'total_discount', SUM(BLL_SV_AM),
        'discount_limit', (SELECT MLIM_AM FROM WPD_T_SV_SNGL_PRP_INF WHERE SV_C = 'SP03608'),
        'remaining_limit', (
            SELECT MLIM_AM - COALESCE(SUM(BLL_SV_AM), 0)
            FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ
            WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695'
            AND SL_DT LIKE '202409%'
            AND BLL_SV_DC = 'SP03608'
        )
    )
    FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ
    WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695'
    AND SL_DT BETWEEN '20240701' AND '20240930'
    AND BLL_MC_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%') as discount_info,
    
    (SELECT json_group_array(EVN_BULT_TIT_NM)
     FROM WLP_T_EVN_INF
     WHERE EVN_BULT_TIT_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%'
     AND EVN_SDT <= '20240930'
     AND EVN_EDT >= '20240701') as related_events;]
(Background on this error at: https://sqlalche.me/e/20/e3q8)"

request: "{'query': \"SELECT \\n    (SELECT SUM(SL_AM) \\n     FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ \\n     WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695' \\n     AND SL_DT BETWEEN '20240701' AND '20240930' \\n     AND BLL_MC_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%') as total_amount,\\n    \\n    (SELECT json_group_array(json_object(\\n        'date', SL_DT,\\n        'amount', SL_AM,\\n        'discount', BLL_SV_AM\\n    ))\\n    FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ \\n    WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695' \\n    AND SL_DT BETWEEN '20240701' AND '20240930'\\n    AND BLL_MC_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%') as daily_details,\\n    \\n    (SELECT json_object(\\n        'total_discount', SUM(BLL_SV_AM),\\n        'discount_limit', (SELECT MLIM_AM FROM WPD_T_SV_SNGL_PRP_INF WHERE SV_C = 'SP03608'),\\n        'remaining_limit', (\\n            SELECT MLIM_AM - COALESCE(SUM(BLL_SV_AM), 0)\\n            FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ\\n            WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695'\\n            AND SL_DT LIKE '202409%'\\n            AND BLL_SV_DC = 'SP03608'\\n        )\\n    )\\n    FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ\\n    WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695'\\n    AND SL_DT BETWEEN '20240701' AND '20240930'\\n    AND BLL_MC_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%') as discount_info,\\n    \\n    (SELECT json_group_array(EVN_BULT_TIT_NM)\\n     FROM WLP_T_EVN_INF\\n     WHERE EVN_BULT_TIT_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%'\\n     AND EVN_SDT <= '20240930'\\n     AND EVN_EDT >= '20240701') as related_events;\"}"
response:
"Error: (sqlite3.OperationalError) no such column: MLIM_AM
[SQL: SELECT 
    (SELECT SUM(SL_AM) 
     FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ 
     WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695' 
     AND SL_DT BETWEEN '20240701' AND '20240930' 
     AND BLL_MC_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%') as total_amount,
    
    (SELECT json_group_array(json_object(
        'date', SL_DT,
        'amount', SL_AM,
        'discount', BLL_SV_AM
    ))
    FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ 
    WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695' 
    AND SL_DT BETWEEN '20240701' AND '20240930'
    AND BLL_MC_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%') as daily_details,
    
    (SELECT json_object(
        'total_discount', SUM(BLL_SV_AM),
        'discount_limit', (SELECT MLIM_AM FROM WPD_T_SV_SNGL_PRP_INF WHERE SV_C = 'SP03608'),
        'remaining_limit', (
            SELECT MLIM_AM - COALESCE(SUM(BLL_SV_AM), 0)
            FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ
            WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695'
            AND SL_DT LIKE '202409%'
            AND BLL_SV_DC = 'SP03608'
        )
    )
    FROM WBM_T_BLL_SPEC_IZ
    WHERE ACCTNO = '70018819695'
    AND SL_DT BETWEEN '20240701' AND '20240930'
    AND BLL_MC_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%') as discount_info,
    
    (SELECT json_group_array(EVN_BULT_TIT_NM)
     FROM WLP_T_EVN_INF
     WHERE EVN_BULT_TIT_NM LIKE '%스타벅스%'
     AND EVN_SDT <= '20240930'
     AND EVN_EDT >= '20240701') as related_events;]
